name: ShadowNinjaQuest:))
description:
Hello,

This is my 2nd game that I put quite an effort into it. 

So basically, in this game,  Monsters and bad guys have awaken from the underworld and they come to conquer our world, because of their super duper power, guns and bullets don't work on them. So now, the only thing that dis world can depend on is you and your ninja skills.

NOTE: this game IS STILL under development so there are currently only  2 levels in it. THE CURRENT LEVELS(TUTORIAL) are full of power ups for u guys to play around but I would also like u guys to try not using them and test the mechanics and leave a review/ suggestions on what should be changed.

Also: For the final version, many things will be added such as background, VFX and new monsters.

note when playing: make sure that your window's aspect ratio is 16:9

INSTALL INSTRUCTION: after pressing download, you will get transferred to a mega link and at that point, u can just press download as ZIP and extract it and play.
